name: Pilgrim's Peril
description:
Roguelike strategic game for the Game Boy. 

 Latest Version: 0.1.1

This game is free, but if you enjoyed it, please consider supporting it. Fully playable, but currently in development, with additional features and changes planned. Feedback appreciated.

How to Play:

Each game takes you through a randomised set of six regions, with randomised treasure rewards throughout offering unique abilities.

Stats (Starting Value):

    • Willpower (25) - You need this to move (dice rolls).
    • Health (10) - You need this to be alive.
    • Mana (10) - You need this to use treasures.
    • Gold (0) - You need this to buy things.

Controls:

    • A - Progress Actions (Roll, Move, Encounter)
    • B - Back/Cancel
    • START - Menu (Equipment, Items, Stats)
    • SELECT - Free-view mode (Allows viewing the board)

Items:

    • * Treasures - Provide abilities to aid your journey.
    • * Rations - Restore 2 health.
    • * Potions - Restore 2 mana.
    • Ingots - Worth more at the end of your journey.

* You can buy these from your Items/Supply screen at any time.

Goal:

Survive the journey to receive Gems (10% of your score), for unlocking further rewards. Earn trophies and improve your high score along the way.

Scoring Values:

Gold1Treasure15Ingot30

Soundtrack is available as a downloadable GB rom, or via Soundcloud.
